name: The Two Faced Corporation
description:
After annoying a corporation you've been working for, the workers have been assigned to kill you. All you have is a mace from your old basement. Use the player movement to swing the mace around and collect speed boosts that randomly appear.

Note: This game was made literally in 3 days so don't expect much from it. We are happy to update the game if people like it! Also hats may be a bit cramped but you will only equip it if you go too far down on the hat. 

Programmed by hexelont 

Sprites and all hat ideas by notsymple

ete wants credit for doing nothing so why not.
